title: Enhancing meaningful Indigenous leadership and collaboration in international environmental governance forums
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 162

Author(s): Melanie Zurba, Sandie Suchet-Pearson, Ryan Bullock, Ameyali Ramos Castillo, Kevin Chang, Ricky Archer, Eli Enns, Pasang Dolma Sherpa, Ramiro Batzin, Osvaldo Munguia, Anastasia Papadopoulos, Bryanne Lamoureux, Charlotte Greenlees, Melika Habibi, Ahmad Hameed, Richie Howitt
